name: Rotation Walker - Kenney Jam 2021
description:
Made for Kenney Jam 2021.

A walking simulator set on a alien planet. Repair your rocket and leave the planet.

There are two versions. One uses native resolution, the other has a pixellation filter, which we think looks cool but might annoy some folk.

Made in collaboration with Wheybags

Controls

WASD + Mouse: Movement and Looking

Left Click: Interact
